::Battera/DarkMouse::  

Battera::
She used her sonar to find the bots standing near the entrance of a 
cave.  She swung down and hung upside down in a tree just outside the 
cave.  She waited to see what would happen.
________________________________

DarkMouse::
"Gee, I hope it freindly." she said with a smirk on her face.  She 
drew her dagger and rested it on her hip.  This was a new bot to her 
and she didn't trust this one just yet.


----Original message----
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> Quickstrike squinted his crimson eyes as he listened in onto 
Battera. 
> "That's what ah wanted t' hear." He and his comrades were somewhat 
safe 
> hearing she wasn't with Hell Beast. He turned to Dark Mouse. "Come 
on," he 
> said, gesturing to her. He nudged Stingtra and walked towards the 
mouth of 
> the cave.
